mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scrape_jobs (status, total_categories, scraped_count, started_at, created_at) VALUES (#{status}, #{totalCategories}, #{scrapedCount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE scrape_jobs SET status = 'COMPLETED', completed_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, status, total_categories, scraped_count, error_message, started_at, completed_at, created_at FROM scrape_jobs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT id, status, total_categories, scraped_count, error_message, started_at, completed_at, created_at FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' ORDER BY completed_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, status, total_categories, scraped_count, error_message, started_at, completed_at, created_at FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
